channel.title: Exps on Sambid Wasti
channel.description: Recent content in Exps on Sambid Wasti

item.description: EXPERIENCE MAIN I am part of the team to develop ComPair telescope, a prototype of AMEGO. AMEGO is a midex mission concept. Additional information about AMEGO. ComPair (and AMEGO) uses four subsystem to achieve its scientific and instrument goals. These subsystems are Double Sided (DSSD) Silicon Tracker, CzT calorimeter, CsI calorimeters and Anti-Coincidence detectors (ACD). ComPair went to beam test (High Energy beam of particles) at TUNL (HIGS) facility at DUKE University in May of 2022.
